creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Stab stitched binding, vertical text to the right of an image of Frank, shitless in a black leather jacket, spiked choker necklace, and hair tied in knots; 102 pp.
inscription: Interior of front cover, black ink pen: FLY\'S COPY!!! / CALL WHEN DONE / 917 723 2359 / 378 (circled) / (copyright sign) 1995 F.B.H.
title: Frank's Depression Poetry
